comment: /**  * Returns the exit code that should be returned from the application.  * @param exception the exception causing the application to exit  * @return the exit code or {@code 0}.  */
code: /**  * Returns the exit code that should be returned from the application.  * @param exception the exception causing the application to exit  * @return the exit code or {@code 0}.  */ int getExitCode(Throwable exception).
